channel.title: Polkadot payload on Life Story
channel.description: Recent content in Polkadot payload on Life Story

item.title: Polkadot Parse
item.description: What is DOT? DOT is the native token of the Polkadot network in a similar way that BTC is the native token of Bitcoin or ether is the native token of the Ethereum blockchain. The smallest unit of account in a Substrate network (Polkadot, Kusama, etc.) is the Planck. Kusama tokens (KSM) are equal to 1e12 Planck, and Polkadot mainnet DOT are equal to 1e10 Planck. 1 Dot (DOT) = 10000000000 Planck
